title: Something you didn't notice about Leblanc
body:
http://leaguememe.com/images/0FmJEfcoBUxGd9ipCKHSjDq5h2YLlvNVkzy7Z6ug.jpg

Tell me you noticed this :P I only now notice it :P

replies.body:
~~The lake is too dry.~~ Oh someone already did that.
~~The end is too nigh.~~ Something already like that.
The bake is a pie.
You broke the chain you... you... Poppy.{{champion:78}}

I can think of two reasons why LeBlanc's decoy is the one her portrait is focused on.  Just can't get a really good cleavage shot when she's translucent.  While I think clarity would be nice, on the other hand, League has spoiled me.  I've come to expect a certain level of pandering in terms of the scantily clad female champions I guess...
I thought this was common knowledge. :x
She could be tricking us into thinking she's the clone...

I actually did the moment I saw it for the first time. I zoomed it and noticed. Its obious if you just look at the standalone art, instead of the character portrait or the cut up image that shows up when the game is loading
I still don't notice, how can you tell?
Because Lb stay invisible longer than her clone.

Lol you don't read patch notes often do you?
If her clone gets hit she loses invis too.
This Splash art  has been here for awhile :) Might have been different before. Plus no way she'd appear before the clone anyways..
Seems like she deceived the rioters too. Don't worry we will get those Noxus skums.
oh i noticed this i thought it was a pretty cool thing riot put there ^.^

As Leblanc Main, I noticed that a while ago after playing with her alot of games.
I thought at first that it's her clone, but it would be dumb for a leblanc if she don't uses her clone to juke LOL

not nececairy sometime when you want to trick some you can atk the enemie with your charater and run with the clone...
But yah the chance are higher that it the clone useally you dont atk the enemie when so low in hp just for a trick

Also you may not have noticed:

Leblanc didn't need a buff, she was fine.  The only reason people stopped playing her was an overreaction to the well deserved removal of silence.  Now she's op again :P
